name: predictions
description: Get predictions about a fixture. The predictions are made using several algorithms including the poisson distribution, comparison of team statistics, last matches, players etcâ€¦ Bookmakers odds are not used to make these predictions. Also provides some comparative statistics between teams

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: bookmakers
description: Get all available bookmakers. All bookmakers id can be used in endpoint odds as filters.

search.description: The maximum amount of carbohydrates in grams the recipe can have per serving.

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: bets
description: Get all available bets. All bets id can be used in endpoint odds as filters

id.description: The id of the bet name

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: odds
description: Get odds from games or leagues. We provide pre-match odds between 1 and 7 days before the game. We keep a 7-day history (The availability of odds may vary according to the leagues, seasons, games and bookmakers). Odds are updated once a day.

season.description: The season of the league, eg:2019

timezone.description: A valid timezone from the endpoint Timezone

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

season.description: The season of the league, eg:2019

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: seasons
description: All seasons can be used in other endpoints as filters.

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: countries
description: Get the list of available countries. The id name and code fields can be used in other endpoints as filters.

code.description: The code of the country. Example: code=EN, IT, FR.

search.description: The name of the country(>= 3 characters)

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: leagues
description: Get the list of available leagues and cups. The league id are unique in the API and leagues keep it across all seasons

type.description: Enum: 'league', 'cup'. The type of the league.

code.description: The code of the country. Example: code=EN, IT, FR.

search.description: The code of the country(>= 3 characters)

last.description: The X last leagues/cups added in the API

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: fixtures_head_to_head
description: Get heads to heads between two teams.

h2h.description: The ids of the teams, eg: '142-144'

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: fixtures
description: For all requests to games you can add the query parameter timezone to your request in order to retrieve the list of games in the time zone of your choice like 'Europe/London'. To know the list of available time zones you have to use the endpoint timezone. This endpoint requires at least one parameter.

ids.description: One or more fixture ids, eg: id-id-id

live.description: All or several leagues ids, enum: 'all', 'id-id'

season.description: The season of the league, eg: 2019

status.description: Enum: 'NS', 'NS-PST-FT', One or more fixture status short

venue.description: The venue id of the fixture

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: fixtures_round
description: Get the rounds for a league or a cup.

season.description: The season of the league, eg: 2019

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: teams_statistics
description: Returns the statistics of a team in relation to a given competition and season.

season.description: The season of the league, eg: 2019

api_key.description: API-KEY required to access this information.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
